author: gawor
msg: include empty directories in archive. related to GERONIMO-4086

author: jvanzyl
msg: MARTIFACT-20: constrain, and preserve relationships along a given branch to make sure that we don't grab a set of dependencies from separate partitions of the tree which is not correct. sometimes we need to backtrack to find the correct version in the correct branch.

author: rhs
msg: QPID-1116: fixed a race condition in connection/session close, session close now waits for the session to be detached before returning, this guarantees we won't have any active sessions when the connection close is attempted
